name: generate_dita_topic
description: Create a structured DITA topic based on the input content type and sections. Supports different DITA specializations such as concept, task, and topic.

title.description: The title of the DITA topic.

shortdesc.description: A brief description of the topic, usually a single paragraph summarizing the content.

type.description: The DITA topic type or specialization. Options include 'concept', 'task', 'reference', or 'topic'.

content_sections.description: An array of content sections that make up the main body of the DITA topic. Each section can include various components like paragraphs, lists, or tables.

section_title.description: The title of the content section.

section_type.description: Type of content for this section (e.g., 'paragraph', 'ordered_list', 'table').

content.description: The actual content within the section, formatted as an array of strings for paragraphs or arrays of arrays for tables.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for the topic, such as author, keywords, and audience.

keywords.description: Keywords associated with the topic for search optimization.
